thread.title: DSS World Premiere of "Sonic the Hedgehog™, Connecting Families” to kick off at Ibn Battuta MallTravelandtourworld.com
thread.title_full: DSS World Premiere of "Sonic the Hedgehog™, Connecting Families” to kick off at Ibn Battuta MallTravelandtourworld.com

author: travelandtourworld.com
title: DSS World Premiere of "Sonic the Hedgehog™, Connecting Families” to kick off at Ibn Battuta MallTravelandtourworld.com
text:
DSS World Premiere of “Sonic the Hedgehog™, Connecting Families” to kick off at Ibn Battuta Mall Published on : Monday, August 31, 2015
As the 18th edition of Dubai Summer Surprises (DSS) approaches its final week residents and visitors from around the world can look forward to connecting with near and dear ones at the fun-filled experiences that will be offered at the DSS World Premiere of “Sonic the Hedgehog™, Connecting Families.”
The Sonic challenge is set to take place at Ibn Battuta Mall from 30 August to 5 September daily from 4pm to 5:15pm, 6pm – 7:15pm, 8pm – 9:15pm and 10pm – 11:15pm – with the unique attraction promising to conclude the DSS family entertainment line-up at shopping malls on a thrilling note.
“Sonic the Hedgehog™, Connecting Families” – DSS World Premiere will feature a sonic themed obstacle course where families must work together and complete fun challenges against the clock. Those completing the course in the shortest time will take home exciting prizes as rewards. From an amazing themed area to delight ardent Sonic fans to a number of interactive games to connect families in a fun way – the experience offers many adventures during the final week of DSS.
Fans also have the opportunity to meet Sonic the Hedgehog known for his ability to run at supersonic speeds and curl into a ball during a combat. Fans of this popular character can look forward to being the first audiences in the world to be able to mingle with him and take pictures. The meet-and-greet sessions will take place from 30 August to 5 September daily at 5:15pm, 7:15pm, 9:15pm and 11:15pm.
“Sonic the Hedgehog™, Connecting Families” – DSS World Premiere is hosted as part of the on-going 18th edition of Dubai Summer Surprises (DSS), organised by the Dubai Festivals and Retail Establishment (DFRE), an agency of the Department of Tourism and Commerce Marketing (DTCM). DSS 2015 runs until 5 September under the theme “45 Days of Summer”, offering residents and visitors from around the world numerous shopping and entertainment options as well as many rewarding winning opportunities.
